mapper.update: UPDATE groupboard SET gBoardCategori = #{gBoardCategori}, gBoardRegdate = sysdate WHERE groupBoardId = #{groupBoardId}
mapper.select: select gboardcategori, count(gboardcategori) gBoardCount from groupboard where groupId = #{groupId} group by gboardcategori having gboardcategori ='ToDo' or gboardcategori='ING' or gboardcategori='END' ORDER BY gboardcategori desc
